content.query:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[stg_Parcels]
(
    parcel_id NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
    owner_id NVARCHAR(64) NULL,
    owner_name NVARCHAR(200) NULL,
    area_name NVARCHAR(200) NULL,
    zoning_code NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    cadastral_code NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    intended_use NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    regulatory_status NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    land_use NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    area_sq_m DECIMAL(18,2) NULL,
    centroid_lon FLOAT NULL,
    centroid_lat FLOAT NULL,
    last_transaction_date DATETIME2(3) NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
